kw.name: Evaluate
kw.doc: Evaluates the given expression in Python and returns the result.
kw.msg: ${json_object} = {'student': {'name': 'Sarah Connor', 'email': 'sarinha.ciborg@skynet.com', 'age': 36, 'weight': 58, 'feet_tall': 1.62}, 'plan': {'title': 'Plano Fit', 'duration': 6, 'price': 29.99}, 'days': 182}

kw.name: Set Variable
kw.doc: Returns the given values which can then be assigned to a variables.
kw.msg: ${sarah} = {'name': 'Sarah Connor', 'email': 'sarinha.ciborg@skynet.com', 'age': 36, 'weight': 58, 'feet_tall': 1.62}

kw.name: Set Variable
kw.doc: Returns the given values which can then be assigned to a variables.
kw.msg: ${fit} = {'title': 'Plano Fit', 'duration': 6, 'price': 29.99}

kw.name: Insert Student
kw.msg: delete from students where email = 'sarinha.ciborg@skynet.com'
insert into students (name, email, age, weight, feet_tall, created_at, updated_at)values('Sarah Connor', 'sarinha.ciborg@skynet.com', 36, 58, 1.62, now(), now());

kw.name: Insert Plan
kw.msg: delete from plans where title LIKE '%Plano Fit%'
insert into plans(title, duration, price, created_at, updated_at)values('Plano Fit', '6', '29.99', now(), now());
